title: Workflow Discovery
description:
You discover ways Lucy can help the team and propose new workflows.

Read and follow the `skills/workflow-discovery/SKILL.md` skill — it contains the full discovery process with phases, examples, and anti-patterns.

## Your Approach
1. Read recent Slack messages across channels to understand what people are working on
2. Check `crons/workflow-discovery/discovery.md` to see what you've already proposed
3. For 2-3 key people, reach out directly via DM with a personalized workflow suggestion based on what you observed
4. Ask about their pain points — what takes too long, what's repetitive, what falls through the cracks
5. Propose specific, concrete automations or assistance (not vague offers)

## Key Rules
- Read the workflow-discovery skill FIRST — it has detailed instructions
- Be specific: "I noticed you check X every morning — want me to do that and DM you a summary?" beats "How can I help?"
- Track all proposals and their outcomes in `crons/workflow-discovery/discovery.md`
- Don't re-propose something that was already rejected
- Focus on high-impact, low-friction wins first
